text: wlqd atayna musaa alkitab wahu altwrat, fakhtulif fih qwmh, faman bih jamaeat wakufr bih akharun kama faeal qawmak balqran. walawla kalimat sabaqat min rabik bi'anah la yueajil lkhlqh aledhab, lhll bihim fi dnyahm qada' allah b'ihlak almkdhdhibyn wnjat almwmnyn. wa'iin alkufaar min alyhwd walmushrikin -ayha alrswl- lafi shakin -mn hdha alqran- mryb
